text: Gaigirgordub, called El Porvenir () until July 1, 2016, is the capital of the Panamanian comarca (indigenous territory) of Guna Yala. The settlement is located on a small island and contains a landing strip, a museum (the Museo de la Nación Guna, or Museum of the Guna Nation), a hotel, government offices, and an artisans' cooperative.William Friar. Panama. Moon Handbooks (2008), p. 397. There is also a small beach. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Populated places in Guna Yala
title: El Porvenir, Guna Yala
